pii_candidates.description: Array of detected PII (Personally Identifiable Information) candidates found in the document

value.description: The actual PII value found in the document

pii_type.description: The type or category of PII detected (e.g., SSN, credit card number, email, driver license number, date of birth, etc.)

confidence.description: Confidence level that this is actually PII

context.description: Brief context where this PII was found in the document
